bicho.label: Type a number between {{min}} and {{max}}
bicho.poor: You don't have enough stars to bet on! Try another value!
bicho.bet-description:
Choose a way of betting! You can bet on an animal, a unit, a dozen, a hundred, a thousand, an animal, a sequence or corner of animals. Choose your category below, and after that, select the bet itself

**MULTIPLIER BY CHOICE:**
**Unit:** {{unity}}x :star:
**Tens:* * {{ten}}x :star:
**Hundred:** {{hundred}}x :star:
**Thousands:** {{thousand}}x :star:
**Animal: ** {{animal}}x :star:
**Sequence:** {{sequence}}x :star:
**Quina:** {{corner}}x :star:
bicho.close: Bets are off! Wait for the announcement of winners, and bet again
bicho.invalid-bet: You inserted an invalid bet. Please check your selection and try again
bicho.already: You have already bet on the Animal Game! wait for the next one to start
bicho.how-to-description:
Jogo do bicho is based on 5 miles drawn every {{duration}} hours. You can bet on different categories: `number`, `animal`, `sequence` and `corner`. In number, you choose any number between 0 and 9999. Your bet will have different payouts based on whether the number you bet is one, ten, one hundred or one thousand. If the number you bet falls on any of the 5 draws, you win!
The other 3 ways to bet are based on the table of animals that you can see below. The animal is based on the ten of the numbers drawn, so what counts are only the last 2 numbers of each draw. The animal bet is the simplest, if the animal you chose falls into one of the 5 draws, you win! Next, you choose two animals. These animals must land in sequence in any of the draws. They don't need to be right after (for example, draw 1 and draw 2), they just need to be in sequence (for example, draw 2 and draw 5). Finally, the quinine! To win the corner, you must say the animals that will be drawn in all 5 rounds. The order doesn't matter on the corner, you just have to hit the 5 animals (there may be repetitions).

**TABLE OF ANIMALS**

{{table}}
bicho.footer: For older results, enter the support server
bicho.success: Your bet has been successfully placed! Stay tuned to the results to see if you've won anything. But don't worry, the credit will be automatically added from your account!

calvo.text:
**{{name}}** baldness

> {{user}} has baldness type **{{type}}** and is in the **{{stage}}**
{{description}}

"___We are born from baldness, from baldness we will die...___" - {{author}}, 2018

descriptions.0-0: At the beginning of everything, your life will still be problematic in the future, but don't despair, baldness will always reign, and we shouldn't be afraid of it!
descriptions.0-1: Your forehead starts to stand out, they must have called you a mosquito airport, but don't be shaken, what's theirs is kept!
descriptions.0-2: You already look more like a priest of old, you've lost hope of recovering what was once most sacred to you, and all you have to do is hand over the rest of your hair
descriptions.0-3: The end, not even an implant should solve the problem, baldness won, don't fight anymore, now just rest... Rest and enjoy this new life, the life of those who lived, and experienced it!
descriptions.1-0: Voc√™ percebe que est√° come√ßando e sabe que n√£o pode parar, a luta agora vai ser de quanto tempo vai demorar para a calvice te derrotar
descriptions.1-1: Donut! That's what they call you. At that moment you start wearing caps and hats to hide what you feel ashamed of, baldness is starting
descriptions.1-2: You don't use shampoo anymore, the only thing you use is furniture polish to make your beautiful bald spot shine. You've been through a lot, so you don't care what others say
descriptions.1-3: So that's it, the end has come. The baldness beat you, nothing more can be done. But, it wasn't a defeat! It was a victory! For going through the worst kind of baldness possible, and finally reaching the The end!
descriptions.2-0: It's the beginning of a new life. You look in the mirror and realize what you didn't want. You're going bald, and you know it, you just haven't accepted it yet
descriptions.2-1: Two side entries appear on your head, you are relieved that your baldness is the most common of all, and also the most charming.
descriptions.2-2: Your hair looks more like a pre-tsunami tide receding. You don't care what happens to your hair, you are an acceptor, a person who accepts baldness as it is
descriptions.2-3: This is your end, the same as all the other bald ones. You didn't want to get to this point, your baldness was beautiful, and now, it's just one more on the list of those who now, no longer have nothing else
descriptions.3-0: The day has come, the day you realize you're starting to go bald, the only plea you have is not to be the **O** type. Let it be anything but the **O** type. THE
descriptions.3-1: You don't believe in yourself. It couldn't be worse, you realize that your baldness starts as a type O. At least you can hide your top with a hat, and be proud of the charm that type M brings your head
descriptions.3-2: You can't hide it, everyone knows you're a mix. But you don't let yourself be shaken, and of course it tells everyone and everything that you're just cutting Ronaldinho Ga√∫cho.
descriptions.3-3: The end of the ends. You are grateful to have had this baldness. As much as you didn't trust it at first, and that you were afraid of what others would think, you won, and made it to the end. Congratulations champion !
